sections.name: PayDirt Grant Recipients Announced
sections.heading: PayDirt Grant Recipients Announced
sections.content:
We founded PayDirt in 2019 and pledged $1 million to fund recreational mountain bike trail opportunities around the world.
Now we’re announcing our first round of grant recipients for PayDirt. Seventeen groups from around the world were selected, and these groups range from land trusts to advocacy to high school race teams and grassroots trail builders. Meet the people making it happen and learn about their projects.
